casebody.data:
McWHORTER v. BARNES et al. In re BRYAN-BEATTY CO. et al. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. October 6, 1922.) No. 3862. Stephen C. Upson, of Athens, Ga., for petitioner. Abit Nix, of Athens, Ga., for appellees.

Before WALKER, BRYAN, and KING, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

For reasons stated in the opinion rendered by the District Judge, we think that the ruling complained of was correct. It follows that the petition should be denied; and it is so ordered. Petition denied.
